theme.design_rules: No gradients, sharp, bold typography, clean minimal look

steps.message: Most people quit in 3 days. You won't.
Pick 2-3 pillars to start. Don't overwhelm yourself.
Commit to showing up for 7 days. Just 7.

habits.title: Recharge with 7 hours of quality sleep
habits.why: Sleep improves focus, recovery, mood and long-term health. Lack of sleep leads to poor willpower and brain fog.
habits.how: Fix a consistent sleep time, avoid screens 1 hour before bed, use mouth tape for nasal breathing.

habits.title: Wake up energized by taping your mouth for deep nasal breathing
habits.why: Mouth taping encourages nasal breathing, improves oxygen intake and quality of sleep.
habits.how: Use safe hypoallergenic mouth tape. Apply before sleeping. Do not use if you have nasal blockage.

habits.title: Absorb natural energy — 5 min sun gaze
habits.why: Morning sunlight regulates circadian rhythm, boosts vitamin D and enhances mood.
habits.how: Expose yourself to sunlight for 5 minutes after waking, avoid looking directly into the sun.

habits.title: Protect your skin health — quick skincare routine
habits.why: Skincare keeps skin clean, reduces acne, protects against aging.
habits.how: Wash face with mild cleanser, apply moisturizer. Optional sunscreen if going outside.

habits.title: Stay fresh — wash hair twice a week
habits.why: Keeps scalp healthy, prevents oil build-up, improves appearance.
habits.how: Use shampoo suitable for your hair type, condition if needed.

habits.title: Smell good, feel confident — use a scent daily
habits.why: Good smell boosts self-confidence, leaves strong impressions.
habits.how: Apply deodorant/perfume lightly on pulse points after shower.

habits.title: Dress sharp — wear clothes that fit you
habits.why: Well-fitted clothes enhance confidence and appearance.
habits.how: Pick clothes that match your body type. Avoid too loose or too tight.

habits.title: Stretch 15 minutes daily
habits.why: Improves flexibility, reduces stiffness and prevents injuries.
habits.how: Do full body stretches targeting shoulders, hips, hamstrings.

habits.title: Do a breath workout
habits.why: Breathing exercises improve lung health, calm mind and reduce stress.
habits.how: Practice box breathing or alternate nostril breathing for 5–10 min.

habits.title: Train 6 times a week (Push/Pull/Legs)
habits.why: Structured strength training builds muscle, strength, endurance.
habits.how: Split workout: Push (chest, triceps, shoulders), Pull (back, biceps), Legs. 2 cycles per week.

habits.title: Walk 10,000 steps daily
habits.why: Walking boosts cardiovascular health, burns calories, improves mental clarity.
habits.how: Track steps with phone/watch. Aim for 10k throughout the day.

habits.title: Train abs 2 times per week
habits.why: Core strength improves posture, protects spine and enhances performance.
habits.how: Add ab exercises (plank, crunches, leg raises) on leg days.

habits.title: Consume 1g protein per bodyweight (kg)
habits.why: Protein supports muscle growth, repair and satiety.
habits.how: Calculate weight in kg. Example: 70kg = 70g protein daily.

habits.title: Journal daily
habits.why: Journaling clears thoughts, tracks progress, improves self-awareness.
habits.how: Write for 5-10 minutes. Reflect on wins, struggles, gratitude.

habits.title: Do 10 minutes meditation
habits.why: Meditation reduces stress, improves focus, builds mindfulness.
habits.how: Sit quietly, focus on breath or use guided app.

habits.title: 1 tutorial a day
habits.why: Daily learning compounds into mastery over time.
habits.how: Watch or read a tutorial related to skills you want to develop.

habits.title: Read at least 10 pages
habits.why: Reading builds knowledge, focus and creativity.
habits.how: Read a physical or digital book. Avoid skimming.

habits.title: Develop faith
habits.why: Faith builds resilience and optimism, helps during hard times.
habits.how: Affirmations, spiritual practices, or gratitude journaling.

habits.title: Learn from mentors, not influencers
habits.why: Mentors offer practical wisdom vs. shallow content.
habits.how: Follow credible sources, seek structured knowledge.

habits.title: Drink 3-4L water daily
habits.why: Hydration improves energy, focus, digestion.
habits.how: Carry a water bottle. Add electrolytes if needed.

habits.title: No alcohol
habits.why: Alcohol damages liver, sleep and productivity.
habits.how: Replace with sparkling water, tea, or mocktails.

habits.title: Eat organic foods
habits.why: Organic foods reduce toxin intake and improve health.
habits.how: Choose clean produce and whole foods.

habits.title: High protein meals
habits.why: Supports muscle repair, metabolism and satiety.
habits.how: Prioritize lean meats, eggs, legumes in each meal.

habits.title: Avoid sugars
habits.why: Sugar spikes insulin, causes weight gain and energy crashes.
habits.how: Replace soda with water, choose natural fruits.

habits.title: Say no to high-calorie bomb meals
habits.why: Excessive calories lead to fat gain and sluggishness.
habits.how: Avoid fast food and fried items. Opt for balanced meals.

habits.title: Learn something new daily
habits.why: Continuous learning keeps brain sharp and adaptable.
habits.how: Pick a small concept daily and master it.

habits.title: Build high-income skills
habits.why: Market rewards skills, not just degrees. High-value skills lead to financial success.
habits.how: Dedicate time each day to practice one of these skills.

habits.title: Start a business
habits.why: Business builds independence, wealth and freedom.
habits.how: Plan, research, or take small steps towards building.

habits.title: Learn skills that make money
habits.why: Income-generating skills lead to freedom.
habits.how: Invest 30-60 min daily on practice.

habits.title: Save 20% of income
habits.why: Savings provide security and capital for investment.
habits.how: Automate savings transfer each month.

habits.title: Invest, even a dollar
habits.why: Investing builds wealth long-term through compounding.
habits.how: Invest small amounts regularly into safe assets.

habits.title: Build multiple income streams
habits.why: Diversification ensures stability and freedom.
habits.how: Create side hustles, freelancing, digital products.

habits.title: Avoid useless debt
habits.why: Debt traps you into financial slavery.
habits.how: Avoid buying depreciating items on credit.

habits.title: Track your money flow
habits.why: Awareness leads to control of finances.
habits.how: Write down expenses weekly.

motivation: Consistency beats intensity. Show up today.
You've beaten 90% of people who quit in a week.
You are proof of the compound effect.
Most people quit. You're not most people.
The streak doesn't lie. Keep building.
Discipline is doing it when you don't feel like it.
Your future self is watching. Make them proud.
